description: 🤖 Design automated conversations in minutes. 👌 Through a visual and intuitive flow builder. 🌏 Get instant results and grow your business in 54 languages.

title: Wannahireme
blurb: Get hired through your side projects
description: Wannahireme is the best way to get hired through your online presence. Create a page to showcase all your talents from sites like github, codepen.io etc and ways you want to get hired like linkedin, upwork etc. Share your unique link or generate a hire button to add to your projects.

title: Skip Silence 3
blurb: Skip silence in audio and video online
description: "Skip Silence" is a browser extension that allows you to automatically skip parts of a video or audio file that are silent - without loosing any important information. Skip Silence has recently been rewritten to be more stable and run on more platforms.

title: Where in the World is AI?
blurb: Visualization of where AI has been helpful and harmful
description: A visualization tool that highlights where AI has been helpful and harmful worldwide. On the map, you can filter by domains from health services to law enforcement, set a year range, and filter by categorization on whether AI has been helpful or harmful.

title: Polybox Email Templates
blurb: Solution for email creating in coded templates and modules
description: Share your thoughts and news with readers in a stylish and simple way. 100+ email modules about the most readable topics. They’re already ready-to use. Just decide what you are going to talk about, edit templates as you wish and send.

title: GoSquared Assistant 3.0
blurb: Messaging for makers.
description: Introducing the all-new GoSquared Assistant. On-site and in-app messaging, lovingly made for your SaaS business.

title: Wishfinity
blurb: All your wishes in a single sharable link
description: Wishfinity allows family and friends to exchange perfect presents. Create and share a free universal wishlist that combines all retailers and brands into a single link. No more guesswork. No more unwanted merchandise. Give and get the right gifts every time.

title: No Meat Today 2.0
blurb: An app to help you eat less meat
description: 🎂 A special cow to celebrate Product Hunt's 7th birthday! Eating less meat is a challenge but can help avoid pandemics (and lots more). Use this non-judgmental app to change your diet 🥦 Eat green, whatever that means to you 🐮 Attract cows, feel good/proud

title: xEmailExtractor
blurb: Find targeted leads from instagram
description: Using our web app you can find leads from Instagram based on your own followers/your competitors followers/following or you can also find leads that posted for a specific hashtag. You'll get a high open rate, people that put their email on IG expect emails.

title: Bestmap
blurb: Compare and book scooters, bikes, metro, cars & air tickets
description: Bestmap is an aggregator that includes urban mobility: metro, busses, bikes, e-scooters... suburban mobility: trains, coaches, ferries, flights and even rental cars!

title: Twitter Screenshot Bot
blurb: Takes a screenshot of a tweet and sends it to your DM
description: Twitter Screenshot Bot takes screenshots of tweets. Just mention https://twitter.com/get_screenshot in your reply and the bot will take a screenshot of the tweet and send it to your DM. Don't forget to follow or Twitter Screenshot Bot's messages won't go through.

title: Pretty Snap
blurb: Make screenshots look 🔥 with a pretty background
description: Turn boring screenshots into awesome ones! Add pretty patterns or beautiful images from Unsplash. It's great for: - Product screenshots on landing pages - Eye catching website summary cards - Better screenshot posts on social media It's https://github.com/kangabru/pretty-snap too!

title: Humantic AI API
blurb: API for instant personality insights and personalization
description: Humantic AI API provides full personality assessment and personalization insights for any individual using only a LinkedIn ID, resume, or text. You can understand every customer and be ready to personalize your product at scale in a few hours.

title: PSOhub for HubSpot
blurb: Smart & self-driving PSA Software built for HubSpot users
description: PSOhub provides predictive project management, smart contract management, self-driving time and expense tracking, and invoicing for HubSpot, in a seamlessly integrated platform.

title: Pudding Wisdom
blurb: Talking pudding
description: It's talking pudding.

title: VC State of the Industry: TheVentureCity
blurb: Breakdown of VC activity in N. America, EUR & Latin America
description: Break down of the VC activity in North America, Europe and Latin America and what it means for you as an investor or founder. From the industry's most trusted sources, here’s the topline review of what went down in the VC world last quarter.

title: CodingView.io
blurb: Collaborative coding environment for technical interviews
description: CodingView makes it a breeze to run a successful coding interview. Don't waste time setting up a shared code editor or compiler. We've done it for you! - VS Code-like web code editor, - Live code sharing, - Supporting: Python, C++, Java and more.

title: Store Roulette
blurb: Push a button and get whisked away to a cool online store.
description: Introducing Store Roulette AKA StumbleUpon but for online stores you've never heard of! Push a button & get whisked away to a random online store. It is kind of like a weird new form of window shopping.

title: Botcopy.com
blurb: Dialogflow website chatbots made easy.
description: Botcopy 2.0 brings THE most advanced conversational AI to your website/app in one click. Build your agent's back-end with top AI (e.g., Google Dialogflow) and run Botcopy as your front-end custom UI. Boost efficiency during/after the pandemic. Sign up free!

title: Replicate
blurb: Version control for machine learning
description: Automatically track your experiments and models with two lines of code. Open source and community-built.

title: Parsr
blurb: A note and calculator app. We parse your text into numbers.
description: Parsr is a combined note and calculator app. Our calculator can parse text such as 2 times 4 plus 3, into a value. Can be used as a quick calculator, for reminder notes. Notes can be shared publicly, or kept privately. Check us out!

title: Anti-Racism Daily
blurb: Daily actions to dismantle white supremacy, now on Slack.
description: Anti-Racism Daily for Slack is your daily resource for dismantling white supremacy in the workplace and beyond. Subscribe to receive daily education on systemic oppression and what you can do about it.

title: SwiftHub
blurb: Learn, build & share about all things Swift
description: In this app you can learn Swift language, discover articles, news, books, podcasts, documentations, videos, Swift syntax, find your queries on Stack Overflow, Swift challenges, bookmark your favorite topics, get access to popular GitHub repositories & so on.

title: Rowlab
blurb: Hand-picked collection of mobile patterns for inspiration
description: Hand-picked collection of Android apps screenshots with mobile patterns for your inspiration. You could filter by pattern type or element of the interface.

title: Shopping Party
blurb: Add your friends to your shopping cart
description: Nostalgic about the shopping trips to the mall? Shopping Party allows you to bring your friends along with you while you shop online.

title: Productroad 2.0
blurb: Build better products based on customers feedback
description: Productroad helps companies to make better products by listening to customers. It's a place where customers can leave feedback and upvote feedback from other users. We provide a changelog and send notifications to customers informing them about feedback.

title: Standard Alert by Mention
blurb: Advanced media monitoring with a simplified experience
description: Mention’s Standard Alert allows you to eliminate noise and get super accurate results without having to worry about query-building rules. Thanks to the power of Boolean operators, you can now take your social listening and media monitoring to the next level.

title: Ploi Core
blurb: Launch your own webhosting service
description: With Ploi Core, you'll power-launch your webhosting company 🚀 Using the Ploi.io system as a backbone, you'll be able to serve your customers with a custom panel & branding ✨

title: Task Prioritization for Asana
blurb: Smooth 2-way integration to sync tasks and priority scores.
description: Prioritize tasks collaboratively in Ducalis.io. Sort by priority in Asana with two-way issue sync. Keep your Asana custom fields neat and clean. Use any prioritization framework. Evaluate together and enhance your team alignment with Ducalis score analysis.

title: How Many People Have Voted?
blurb: Mail-in and early just how many people have voted already?
description: More people than ever are voting, and voting early! But just how many have voted already?

title: strongDM 2.0
blurb: Secure, manage, & audit access to anything a developer needs
description: strongDM provides the convenience of a single sign-on experience to secure, manage, and audit access to anything a developer needs - databases, servers, Kubernetes clusters, data centers, web applications, and now the AWS CLI.

title: Plan
blurb: Finance tracker for goals, incomes, savings in one place.
description: It's simple app helps you save money and time. It is not only a "piggy bank" for your funds, but also an tool which helps track progress over a long period of time. And last but not least. Dark theme is here, may the money force be with you! (thanks craftwork)

title: SuchChat
blurb: Telegram-first customer support tool
description: SuchChat is a Telegram-first customer support tool built for: 📢 Channel Admins 👥 Community Managers 🤖 Bot Developers 💳 Business Owners 👨‍💻 And anyone else who spends 1+ hour/day chatting with followers/users/clients in Telegram

title: No Story Lost
blurb: We capture your family stories in a coffee table book
description: We capture + write your family’s stories 🖊 & turn those stories into a beautiful coffee table book 📖 https://www.nostorylost.com/

title: PayPal Generosity Network
blurb: Create fundraising campaigns with PayPal
description: Customers in the U.S. can now create customized fundraising campaigns for themselves, their community or their cause through the Generosity Network, to raise up to $20,000 over a 30-day period.

title: The Symbols 2
blurb: Design essentials icons set
description: Premium handcrafted icons to kickstart any web or mobile project. With a dynamic stroke, three pre-made weights, and pixel perfect quality. Provided with Figma Library, Sketch and Iconjar files, available in SVG, PDF, and PNG. Made with love in Amsterdam.

title: UserExperior
blurb: Discover how your users experience your app
description: UserExperior's qualitative analytics enable product, design and engineering teams get powerful insights into their app users experience. Understand your app users through session replay and heatmaps and deliver the best app experience for them.

title: X Progress 4
blurb: Track progress, in your way.
description: Introduce X Progress 4! Been featured on the Mac App Store (Great in Big Sur / Widgets Get an Update) and the iOS App Store (Great on iOS 14). X Progress helps you to track event’s progress, from the progress of the year, to all kinds of custom events.

title: Darkmode Widget for Nuxt.js
blurb: Add dark-mode to your Nuxt.js project in a few seconds 🌓
description: A Nuxt.js module that adds a dark-mode / night-mode to your nuxt.js website. Just add the module, sit back and relax 🙌

title: QuickBudget
blurb: Quickly review your monthly expenses. Free and 100% private!
description: 100% private and totally free. QuickBudget helps you quickly review your expenses to see where you're over or under-spending. Spending limits percategory can be adjusted to personal preference. Helpful when considering a new car, house, subscription!

title: Fluo
blurb: Alternative home screen icons for iOS and macOS
description: Enhance your iOS 14 Home Screen with gorgeous alternative app icons that have been inspired by Big Sur. Fluo includes 36 hand-crafted app icon PNG files, which cover all the stock Apple app icons.

title: Covid Trip Planner
blurb: COVID-19 risk forecasts for 700+ destinations worldwide
description: Covid Trip Planner gives you 8-week COVID-19 risk assessment of 700+ destinations worldwide to help you plan your next trip. You can find current & future travel restrictions based on our ML models' predictions, which we are planning to open-source soon.

title: Smart Templates by Sarbacane
blurb: Get customized email marketing templates from a URL 💌
description: Smart templates generates beautiful responsive email templates in seconds. Fill in your website's URL and get several ready-to-use email marketing templates customized with your colors, logo and more – as if by magic 🧙 | https://www.smart-templates.com/

title: SheetBest 2.0
blurb: Turn your Spreadsheet (and much more) into a REST API
description: Sheet Best is proud to announce its 2.0 version, with more useful features to automate things 🤖: 📤 XLSX file upload 📂 Google Drive folder integration 📊 Improved dashboard 📡 Improved API and Documentation ✨ New plans delivering even more value

title: CartQL
blurb: GraphQL shopping cart API
description: CartQL is a headless GraphQL shopping cart, and checkout API built to work with your existing inventory. However you handle carts, on the frontend or via remote schema stitching, CartQL was designed to fit right in.

title: Vinokilo
blurb: Stylish and sustainable second hand fashion.
description: Vinokilo is a second hand fashion brand based in Germany selling the highest quality second hand and vintage clothes. Their mission is to make second hand fashion a real alternative to fast fashion by being inclusive and pricing fairly.

title: SideHustle
blurb: The party game for entrepreneurs
description: "It's like Apples to Apples meets Shark Tank." - SideHustle Beta Tester SideHustle was founded to create a fun, engaging game that embodies the entrepreneurial spirit and inspires our creative thinking.

title: DJs Near Me - Cueup
blurb: Find and book DJs near you
description: With "DJs near me," you can check profiles of the best DJs near you. See photos and reviews from their previous gigs, and listen to mixtapes straight from SoundCloud. If you're looking to book a DJ, you can contact and book them directly on Cueup.

title: Erudit AI
blurb: Measure & predict the burnout & engagement in your workspace
description: Understand who is suffering from burnout, measure engagement levels & act on frictions in the workplace before they escalate. We leverage on your existing data to give you a competitive advantage by having insights on how your people are feeling in real time.

title: The New Mac Mini
blurb: Apple's newest Mac Mini with the latest M1 chip
description: It’s here. Our first chip designed specifically for Mac. Packed with an astonishing 16 billion transistors, the Apple M1 system on a chip (SoC) integrates the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and so much more onto a single tiny chip.

title: Serenade Pro
blurb: The most powerful voice coding experience.
description: Serenade is the most powerful way to write code using natural speech. Now, you can run Serenade's speech-to-code engine entirely on your device.

title: Etherflow
blurb: Ethereum node debugger & RPC call composer
description: A FOSS tool for Ethereum developers to test their node, and compose & debug RPC calls right from the browser! Created by the team behind Web3 Infrastructure provider QuikNode.

title: StaticWeb Studio
blurb: Deployment + CMS platform for static websites with #nocode
description: Hosting and CMS platform for static web sites with #nocode Start your static website just in one click

title: Mindful Eating App
blurb: Overcome your productivity-ruining eating behavior
description: Your productivity depends on a healthy body and mind. But your eating habits can ruin that fast and make you feel sluggish and brain foggy. Track your mood, hunger and food to uncover your unhealthy eating habits. Get a clear mind and get better done.

title: Personas by UX Kits
blurb: Create beautiful user personas in Figma, Sketch & Adobe XD
description: Creating user personas is easy with our flexible template for Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD. The kit has 28 components, plus a character building system, so you can create anything from simple persona cards to detailed docs with demographics, timelines and more.

title: The Human Project
blurb: Connecting people through feelings and stories
description: We are The Human Project. We believe that empathy can change the world. By humanizing the statistics in times of event and crisis, we can tell our story beyond numbers.

title: Autumn
blurb: Swipe to shop across +5,000 online stores
description: Sick of going to hundreds of different sites to shop for clothes, home, and gifts? Autumn helps you browse thousands of online stores through swiping—it's like Tinder for shopping. As you swipe, the app recommends new items and stores based on your taste.

title: Strava
blurb: Keep track of your ride & run
description: Tracks exercise while incorporating social network features. Great for cycling and running!

title: Widgee - Beautiful Widgets for iOS 14
blurb: Create unique, useful, and beautiful widgets for iOS 14
description: Widgee is the perfect app to personalize your home screen with beautiful widgets, with ready-to-use templates and a simple interface!

title: Mobile, by Peak Design
blurb: A better way to attach your phone to things.
description: Phones are the most important tools in the world. They're also fragile, slippery little pieces of glass and metal. Mobile by Peak Design is a better way to mount, protect, and use your phone in your everyday life.
